TopicTitle: Assassin's creed III, What a waste.

Articles.Content:
So i just got assassin's creed III on steam during the midweek madness sale, spent all day installing and updating it.

And it crashes as soon as i press 'play' in the U-play menu.
It's a hopeless release. I'm a hardcore fan of the whole series but III had too much flag waving for me. You're not missing much - exept the $15 you paid for it.

Still funnier than AC2.

AC2 was pretty much just finding the hidden way to get to a location and doing something there.
